data.name: IDS_MAINDLG_DLLERROR
data.value:
%s is bad or corrupt. Try re-installing %s.
If the problem persists, contact technical support.

data.name: IDS_MAINDLG_SDNASCAN_INFORMATION
data.value:
There are new file entries in your Quarantine folder, that are yet to be submitted to research lab. We recomm to submit these new files to our research lab. This is important to curb the wild spread of the new virus or malware. Suspicious file submission ensures the detailed analysis of the file in research lab of Quick Heal. After the detailed analysis it can be added in the known virus signature database which will be provided in updates to all the users.
Do you want to submit the new suspicious files in Quarantine?

data.name: IDS_MAINDLG_SDNASCAN_DONTSHOWNEXTTIME
data.value: Don't display this message next time.

data.name: IDS_MAINDLG_RESTRICTED_MSG
data.value: You do not have administrative access rights. Please logon as an Administrator and try again.

data.name: IDS_MAINSTRING_BUYNOWMSG
data.value:
Your current version of %s can only detect and report the viruses during scan. It does not repair the viruses.
To add virus repairing capabilities in the current version you need to buy %s license from %s website. The commercial license will include:
1. Free upgrades till valid period of your license. 2. Free email/telephone support till valid period of your license.

data.name: IDS_ABOUT_WARNING
data.value: Warning: This computer program is protected by copyright law and international treaties. Unauthorized reproduction or distribution may result in severe civil and criminal penalties, and will be prosecuted to the maximum extent possible under the law.

data.name: IDS_ABOUT_MSG_UPDATE_LIC
data.value:
Update License will check for any changes in the license information. This check requires Internet connection. Make sure that you are connected to Internet. Please use this feature only if there is any change in your license information (For example: Direct Renewal done by vor).
To proceed click Continue.

data.name: IDS_ABOUT_MSG_LIC_NO_CHANGE
data.value: There is no change in your license information.

data.name: IDS_ABOUT_MSG_LIC_CHANGE
data.value: Your license information has been updated.

data.name: IDS_ABOUT_COPYRIGHT
data.value: � Copyright 2010 Quick Heal Technologies (P) Ltd. All rights reserved.

data.name: IDS_ABOUT_LICENSE_INTERNET_MSG
data.value: Unable to detect Internet Connection. Please connect to internet and try again.

data.name: IDS_ABTDLG_URL_NOT_OPENED
data.value: Unable to open specified URL. Please check if you have default browser set.

data.name: IDS_TOOLS_MACINFO_WEBBASEDMESSAGE
data.value: %s System Information tool has generated a report that includes information regarding the condition of your PC. The collected information is compressed in INFO.QHC file that will be sent at mailto:%s for detailed analysis.

data.name: IDS_TOOLS_MACINFO_MESSAGE
data.value:
If you suspect a new malware in your PC, you are at right place. System Information tool creates a system report that will help us to find out if your system is infected by some new unknown virus, worm, backdoor, trojan, spyware or adware.
For more details, Press Help.
Press Next to continue with report generation, Cancel to exit.

data.name: IDS_TOOLS_MACINFO_COLLECTMESSAGE
data.value:
System Information tool has generated a report that includes information regarding the condition of your PC. It is generated by analyzing the registry, system files and folders. The collected information is stored in file: %s
Please s this file to our R&D Center for analysis. Email: %s

data.name: IDS_TOOLS_MACINFO_PROBLEMMSG
data.value: Please describe the problem you are facing in brief.

data.name: IDS_TOOLS_MACINFO_SMTPBASEDMESSAGE
data.value:
%s System Information tool has generated a report that includes information regarding the condition of your PC. It is generated by analyzing the registry, system files and folders.
The report contains copy of few registry entries, entries from WIN.INI, SYSTEM.INI, AUTOEXEC.BAT and information about running processes. The collected information is compressed in INFO.QHC file that will be sent to %s Technical Support at %s for analysis.
Regards %s Team
****************************************************************** Disclaimer:
We do not intentionally collect your files, name, address, email address or any other form of information that can be personal. The information that we collect will only be used to analyze new infection in your PC. We respect your privacy. This information will not be shared or disclosed anywhere.
Visit Us At: %s ******************************************************************

data.name: IDS_TOOLS_MACINFO_MSG_UPLOADING_SUCCEDED
data.value: System information file has been submitted successfully.

data.name: IDS_TOOLS_MACINFONEXT_PROBLEMHEADING

data.value: Welcome to Emergency CD Creation Wizard

data.name: IDS_TOOLS_EMERGENCYDISK_MESSAGE
data.value: Emergency CD can be used in emergency situation where your system is infected with virus that need to be cured from boot shell. If your AntiVirus is up to date then the emergency CD will be created using latest signature pattern files. Before creating the emergency CD, please ensure that the system is clean.

data.name: IDS_TOOLS_EMERGENCYDISK_MESSAGE2
data.value: Emergency CD: - Can only be used to scan and clean drives of the same system for which you have licensed Microsoft Windows operating system. - Cannot be used for any other system.

data.name: IDS_SCANDLG_MOBI_WIZARDPAGE_WELMSG
data.value: Welcome to %s Mobile Connection Wizard. This wizard will help you to detect the Mobile Phones connected to your computer. These settings will be saved to scan your mobile later by selecting the mobile.

data.name: IDS_SCANDLG_MOBI_WIZARDPAGE_SELECTPORT
data.value: Select the type of connection you wish to use to connect your mobile phone to computer.

data.name: IDS_SCANDLG_MOBI_WIZARDPAGE_SEARCHMOB
data.value: Please wait while mobile connection wizard detects your mobile phone.

data.name: IDS_SCANDLG_MOBI_WIZARDPAGE_INSTCONN
data.value:
%s Mobile Phone requires %s Connector to be installed on your Mobile Phone.
Click on Install Connector to install the %s Connector. If the connector is already installed, it may not be running. Please start the connector and click Next.

data.name: IDS_SCANDLG_MOBI_WIZARDPAGE_CONNNOTINST
data.value: %s Connector is either not installed or started. If it is already installed, please start it from your mobile phone and try again.

data.name: IDS_SCANDLG_MOBI_WIZARDPAGE_SEARCHFAILED
data.value: Mobile connection wizard was not able to detect %s mobile phone. Please check the connectivity between mobile phone and computer and try again.

data.name: IDS_SCANDLG_MOBI_WIZARDPAGE_SEARCHSUCCESS
data.value: %s mobile phone detected successfully. Click on Finish to add this phone to the mobile phone list.

data.name: IDS_SCANDLG_MOBI_WIZARDPAGE_CONINSTSUCC

data.name: IDS_SCANDLG_MOBI_WIZARDPAGE_FINDFAILED

data.name: IDS_SCANFILEDLG_PARTINFECT
data.value: %s is infected by %s Boot from a clean bootable and use %s Emergency diskette to remove the virus.

data.name: IDS_DLG_ONLNPROM_ONLNENABLECAPTION
data.value: Turning off Virus Protection is not recommed as it will compromise the security of your computer. Your computer will be vulnerable against malwares.

data.name: IDS_DLG_PACKER_DONOT_PROMPT_PACKER
data.value: Do not &prompt for %s packed file again

data.name: IDS_DLG_PACKER_DONOT_PROMPT_FILE
data.value: &Do not prompt for this file again

data.name: IDS_OPT_DATAPRO_DATAPRODESC
data.value: Blocks access to removable drives ( USB drives, Pen drives , Memory cards etc. ) which in turn protects your confidential information being copied using these drives. This feature is depent on Virus Protection. The feature does not imply on Floppy Drives.

data.name: IDS_EXCLUSION_INVALIDPFILENAMEORDIRECTORYNAME
data.value: The file name or directory name is invalid.

data.name: IDS_QHONLINEEXE_APPALREADYRUNNINGINANOTHERSESSION
data.value: Virus Protection is running in other user's session and is also protecting current user session. Virus Protection icon will not appear on system tray.

data.name: IDS_QHONLINEEXE_SERVICEISNOTPROPERLYLOADED
data.value: Virus Protection service is not loaded properly. Unable to load Virus Protection. Problem has been fixed, please restart your system to load Virus Protection.

data.name: IDS_QHONLINEEXE_CANNOTRUNONCURRENTPLATFORM
data.value: This application cannot run on the current platform.

data.name: IDS_QHONLINEEXE_MSG_EMG_DISK
data.value: %s Boot Time Scan has identified some critical threats which cannot be cleaned in native mode. Please update your %s to latest virus definitions and create Emergency CD from Tools->Create Emergency CD option. Once completed with creation process, boot your system with Emergency CD and scan.

data.name: IDS_QHONLINEEXE_FLOATINGMENU_ENTERTAINMENT_MODE_ENABLE
data.value:
You have selected Entertainment Mode.
Entertainment mode temporarily stops displaying alert messages and prompts. This option is useful especially when you are playing games, watching movies or using any other full screen applications. In this mode, %s will protect your system silently and will not display any alerts of any activities or events.

data.name: IDS_QHONLINEEXE_FLOATINGMENU_ENTERTAINMENT_MODE_DISABLE
data.value: You have disabled entertainment mode. %s will now run in interactive mode. Alerts messages and prompts will be displayed in case of any activities or events.

data.name: IDS_QHONLINEEXE_MALWAREFOUND
data.value:
%s Virus Protection has detected Malware in your system. It is recommed that you scan your system with %s AntiMalware to detect and remove the remnants of the Malware.
To launch %s AntiMalware click OK, click Cancel to quit.

data.name: IDS_QHONLINEEXE_ACTIVE_VIRUSFOUND
data.value:
%s has detected some malwares running in your computer. It is recommed that you perform system memory scan immediately to remove active infection from your computer.
To perform system memory scan, click OK.

data.name: IDS_ONLINEEXE_DNASCAN_ACCESSDENYQUARANTINED
data.value: Access is denied and file is quarantined

data.name: IDS_ONLINEEXE_OPS_STARTUP_FAILED
data.value: Virus Protection service is either not installed or not running. It is recommed that you contact your vor or reinstall %s.

data.value: The website you are visiting is infected.

Administrative privileges required.
Hijack Restore cannot restore system registry settings in restricted user mode. You will need to have administrative privileges to perform this task.

data.name: IDS_STATUS_BLOCKEDCOPY
data.value:
Your %s Product Key is being used from multiple installations. Updates for this Product Key are being downloaded from multiple locations. Each %s Product Key can download updates only for single PC.
Unable to update your copy of %s. Please contact your vor or %s Support to resolve this problem.

data.value:

Your %s Product Key is being used from multiple computers. Updates for this Product Key are being downloaded from multiple computers. Each %s Product Key can download updates only for single PC.
